text: James Yates Coop (17 September 1927 - March 1996) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for Sheffield United and York City, and in non-League football for Brodsworth Main and Goole Town. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:1996 deaths Category:People from Horwich Category:Sportspeople from Lancashire Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Brodsworth Welfare A.F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Goole Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Jim Coop
